name: Tiers of The Damned - v1.1.1
description: A survival horror game, in which you are faced with the task of taking claustrophobia to a new level. Dive into the tunnels and avoid the pending threat or threats that awaits you in the dark. Armed with just a flashlight, visit the various locations that hold their own secrets, work your way around the darkness, find the 4 notes scattered across the game and locate the exit, fear awaits.
